uuid.title: UUID
uuid.description: Unique universal identity code for this tax identity.

country.title: Country Code
country.description: ISO country code for Where the tax identity was issued.

zone.title: Zone Code
zone.description:
Where inside the country the tax identity holder is based for tax purposes
like a village, town, district, city, county, state or province. For some
areas, this could be a regular post or zip code. See the regime packages
for specific validation rules.

source.title: Source Key
source.description: What is the source document of the tax identity.

code.title: Code
code.description: Normalized code shown on the original identity document.

meta.title: Meta
meta.description: Additional details that may be required.

Identity.description: Identity stores the details required to identify an entity for tax purposes.

id.title: ID
id.description: Internal ID used to identify the party inside a document.

tax_id.title: Tax Identity
tax_id.description: The entity's legal ID code used for tax purposes. They may have other numbers, but we're only interested in those valid for tax purposes.

name.title: Name
name.description: Legal name or representation of the organization.

people.title: People
people.description: Details of physical people who represent the party.

inboxes.title: Inboxes
inboxes.description: Digital inboxes used for forwarding electronic versions of documents

addresses.title: Postal Addresses
addresses.description: Regular post addresses for where information should be sent if needed.

registration.title: Registration
registration.description: Additional registration details about the company that may need to be included in a document.

meta.title: Meta
meta.description: Any additional semi-structured information that does not fit into the rest of the party.

Party.description: Party represents a person or business entity.

oneOf.description: Sourced directly from a tax agency
An other type of source not listed

SourceKey.title: Source Key
SourceKey.description: SourceKey identifies the source of a tax identity
